vpsissIpipeifDeCompandConfig Struct Reference
VPS Driver API » VPS - Common API » ISS - IPIPEIF Config API

Configuration parameters of de-companding block. More...

#include <vps_cfgipipeif.h>

Detailed Description

Configuration parameters of de-companding block.

Field Documentation

uint32_t vpsissIpipeifDeCompandConfig::enable

TRUE enables de-companding block. FALSE disables de-companding

uint32_t vpsissIpipeifDeCompandConfig::shift

Shift value for PWL, 5 bits are used

uint32_t vpsissIpipeifDeCompandConfig::size

Configure the width of the companded data stream. Refer bit field LUTBITSEL of register IPIPEIF_VPDCMPCFG & IPIPEIF_SDDCMPCFG

uint32_t vpsissIpipeifDeCompandConfig::slope1

Slope value, 16bit is used

uint32_t vpsissIpipeifDeCompandConfig::slope2

Slope value, 16bit is used

uint32_t vpsissIpipeifDeCompandConfig::slope3

Slope value, 16bit is used

uint32_t vpsissIpipeifDeCompandConfig::slope4

Slope value, 16bit is used

uint32_t vpsissIpipeifDeCompandConfig::useLut

The coefficients required by de-companding is provided via an LUT or via registers. Before setting it true, set the luts using VPS_ISS_IPIPEIF_MODULE_UPDATE_LUT command

uint32_t vpsissIpipeifDeCompandConfig::xthr1

Threshold value, 16bit is used

uint32_t vpsissIpipeifDeCompandConfig::xthr2

Threshold value, 16bit is used

uint32_t vpsissIpipeifDeCompandConfig::xthr3

Threshold value, 16bit is used

uint32_t vpsissIpipeifDeCompandConfig::ythr1

Threshold value, 20bit is used

uint32_t vpsissIpipeifDeCompandConfig::ythr2

Threshold value, 20bit is used

uint32_t vpsissIpipeifDeCompandConfig::ythr3

Threshold value, 20bit is used
